description: Galappththige Muditha Prasanna De Silva Vs Commissioner General of Title Settlement and Four Others before Hon.S.U.B. Karalliyadde, J.
parties: Galappththige Muditha Prasanna De Silva Vs Commissioner General of Title Settlement and Four Others
keywords: Section 3(2), 5(1)(a), 29, 64 of the Land Reform Law, agricultural land owned in excess of the ceiling, settlement order, alternative remedy, material facts in dispute, laches.
legistation: Land Reform Law, No. 1 of 1972, Land Settlement Ordinance, No. 31 of 1931 and The Constitution of the Democratic Republic of Sri Lanka.
